short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn Facebook group members to leads on AutoPilot!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"GroupHunter Is An All In One Group Managing Software To Transform Your Group Into A Money-Making Machine"

Take complete control of your group, manage members, convert your members to leads, all automatically. 

Collect emails from your group members and convert them to paying customers.

How GroupHunter helps you?

- With just a click, you can automatically collect and upload new member email addresses to your GroupHunter CRM, your Autoresponder and Google sheets. No need to copy/paste and trying to manage everything manually.
- Manage all your members data like their answers to all of your questions in GroupHunter CRM. GroupHunter CRM stores all your members data in one place. 
- Auto approve members into the group based on your set criteria
- Auto send messages to approved or rejected members
